#### PR description:

This is a backport of #30830 to the 11_1_X series. The content of this PR is identical to that of #30830 . 

#### PR validation:

Please see #30830 .

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Please see #30830 . This is requested for 11_1_X because it might be needed for the next MWGR.

title: EMTF: Improve protection against corrupted LCT data (11_1_X)
